Action.Name: WebCam.HasVideoSourceDialog
Action.Description: Gets a value whether webcam supports a video source dialog.

Action.Description: Gets a value whether webcam supports a video format dialog.

Action.Name: WebCam.HasVideoDisplayDialog
Action.Description: Gets a value whether webcam supports a video display dialog.

Action.Name: WebCam.IsInitialized
Action.Description: Gets a value whether webcam is connected.

Action.Name: WebCam.IsCapturing
Action.Description: Gets a value whether webcam is capturing.

Action.Name: WebCam.IsUiLocked
Action.Description: Gets a value whether ui is locked. Default is true. That means user interface will be locked during capture. If false ui will not be locked during capture.

Action.Name: WebCam.LockUi
Action.Description: Sets a value whether to lock or not the ui during capture. Default is true. That means user interface will be locked during the capture. To stop capture click esc key or mouse keys. If false ui will not be locked during capture.

Arg.Name: Lock
Arg.Description: True or false, whether to lock ui or not during capture.
